description: This file contains Spring Security configuration class for setting up JWT-based stateless security, including bean definitions for password encoding, authentication management, and security filter chain with specific URL access rules.

classes.name: SecurityConfig
classes.description: Configuration class that sets up security filters, authentication manager, and password encoder for the backend application.

methods.name: passwordEncoder
methods.description: Creates and provides a BCryptPasswordEncoder bean for password hashing.

methods.name: authenticationManager
methods.description: Creates and provides an AuthenticationManager bean configured with a DaoAuthenticationProvider that uses UserDetailsService and password encoder.

methods.name: filterChain
methods.description: Defines the SecurityFilterChain bean configuring HTTP security, including CSRF disable, CORS, stateless session, URL access rules, and JWT filter integration.
